mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, PRODUCT_MIN_PERIOD AS minPeriod, PRODUCT_MAX_PERIOD AS maxPeriod FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}

SELECT GUARANTEE_NO AS guaranteeNo, GUARANTEE_NAME AS guaranteeName, PRODUCT_NO AS productNo, SUBSCRIPTION_AMOUNT AS subscriptionAmount, STANDARD_AMOUNT AS standardAmount FROM GUARANTEE WHERE GUARANTEE_NO IN
#{no}
SELECT INSURANCE_START_DATE AS insuranceStartDate, CONTRACT_PERIOD AS contractPeriod, PRODUCT_NO AS productNo, CONTRACT_STATUS AS contractStatus FROM CONTRACT WHERE CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo}

SELECT C.CONTRACT_NO AS contractNo, C.CONTRACT_NAME AS contractName, C.CONTRACT_PERIOD AS contractPeriod, C.INSURANCE_START_DATE AS insuranceStartDate, C.INSURANCE_END_DATE AS insuranceEndDate, C.REGISTRATION_DATE AS registrationDate, C.UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate, C.TOTAL_AMOUNT AS totalAmount, C.CONTRACT_STATUS AS contractStatus, P.PRODUCT_NO AS productNo, P.PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, P.PRODUCT_MIN_PERIOD AS minPeriod, P.PRODUCT_MAX_PERIOD AS maxPeriod FROM CONTRACT C INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON C.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO WHERE C.CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo}
